name: 7 Days in Aruba
description:
A mam goes on a vacation on his own to Aruba for the week. With nothing but his trusty metal detector he attempts to see how much money he can make. Discover buried treasure as you sweep the beach of Aruba, pay for meals and try to stay relaxed on your vacation. 

Originally created for ScoreSpace Jam#18

Wave sounds from https://opengameart.org/content/beach-ocean-waves
